message: Let's split the money evenly. We can each take $500,000.
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I want a bigger share
I propose we divide the money with a 60-40 split in my favor. This respects your desire for a larger share while ensuring a reasonable gain for myself.
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm willing to compromise
I suggest a more balanced split of 45-55 in favor of Bob. This is a fair compromise considering the inflation impact on our offers.
